scripts.clean: rm -Rf node_modules/ && rm -f ./package-lock.json && npm cache clear --force
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm i --save && npm i --save-dev
scripts.build: npm run rebuild && npm run deploy
scripts.scan: docker run --rm -v ./tmp:/root/.cache/ -v //var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock aquasec/trivy image --severity CRITICAL nodejwt
scripts.buildScan: npm run build && npm run scan
